SELECT * FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO , USER_NO , MB.USER_ID , MB.USER_NICKNAME , MOVIE_ID , TV_ID , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_STAR, 'FM0.0') AS "REVIEW_STAR" , REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER MB USING(USER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND MOVIE_ID = #{contentsId} OR TV_ID = #{contentsId} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < = 3

SELECT REVIEW_NO , USER_NO , MB.USER_ID , MB.USER_NICKNAME , R.MOVIE_ID , R.TV_ID , MV.TITLE AS "MOVIE_TITLE" , TV.NAME AS "TV_NAME" , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_STAR, 'FM0.0') AS "REVIEW_STAR" , REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER MB USING(USER_NO) LEFT JOIN MOVIE MV ON(R.MOVIE_ID = MV.MOVIE_ID) LEFT JOIN TV ON (R.MOVIE_ID = TV.TV_ID) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.MOVIE_ID = #{contentsId} OR R.TV_ID = #{contentsId} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE DESC
